result.execSummary:
All charges against Larry Lester Wright in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Larry Lester Wright is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Larry Lester Wright

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Larry Lester Wright in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Sarah Dahdouh appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case scheduled for Jury Trial.  First call:  State is not ready to proceed. On Defense motion, Court ordered case dismissed.

Attorney James Edgar Toran in court.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a final pretrial. Case remains in trial posture.
Court reviewed and addressed with the parties final pretrial documents. 
Parties advises the court there are no outstanding discovery issues remaining. 
Jury Trial remains calendared for August 15th, 2022.
State's Witness List, received and filed.

Defendant Larry Lester Wright in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for status. Defense requests final pre-trial and jury trial dates. Case adjourned back to Br 30.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 09:00 am.  Jury trial scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Larry Lester Wright in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Samantha Raygo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Larry Lester Wright appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Pretrial Conference held.  Defense counsel requests status conference date.  Case adjourned, Br. 30.  Status conference scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Adjustment Number: 22A 038497,
Payable Number: 1001175,
Receipt Number: 22RP016160,
Amount: $20.00
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with JTC and 2301 E Glendale Avenue, Whitefish Bay, WI.

DEFENDANT WAS ORDERED BY THE COURT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 5:00 P.M. ON 03/31/2022. IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.

Defendant Larry Lester Wright in court.  Alexandria S. Carlson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel. Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation. Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 30.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 3/29/22 @ 1:30p
